channel.title: CVE Feed for Swift Sensors -- Swift Sensors Gateway
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Swift Sensors -- Swift Sensors Gateway

item.title: CVE-2021-40422|2024-08-04T02:44:10.120Z -- swift%20sensors -- swift%20sensors%20gateway
item.description: An authentication bypass vulnerability exists in the device password generation functionality of Swift Sensors Gateway SG3-1010. A specially-crafted network request can lead to remote code execution. An attacker can send a sequence of requests to trigger this vulnerability.
